verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
How beautiful to walk
in the steps of the Savior
Stepping in the light,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Stepping in the light;
How beautiful to walk
in the steps of the Savior
Led in paths of light.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Trying to walk in the steps
of the Savior,
Trying to follow
our Savior and King;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Shaping our lives
by His blessed example,
Happy, how happy,
the songs that we bring.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Pressing more closely to
Him who is leading,
When we are tempted
to turn from the way;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Trusting the arm that is
strong to defend us,
Happy, how happy,
our praises each day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Walking in footsteps
of gentle forbearance,
Foot steps of faithfulness,
mercy and love,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Looking to Him for the grace freely promised,
Happy, how happy,
our journey above.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Trying to walk in the steps
of the Savior,
Upward, still upward
we’ll follow our Guide;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
When we shall see Him,
“ the King in His beauty,”
Happy, how happy,
our place at His side.
